original_text:
How often they rebelled against him in the wilderness
    and grieved him in the desert!
korean_text: 그들이 광야에서 그에게 반항하며 사막에서 그를 슬프시게 함이 몇 번인가

sentences.original_text: How often they rebelled against him in the wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 광야에서 그를 얼마나 자주 거역했는지!

sentences.original_text: and grieved him in the desert!
